name: Re:Contra
description:
This is a prototype Contra fangame i'm making.
Controls:

  • Arrow keys for moving and aiming
  • Z to shoot
  • X to jump
  • MMB creates a platform at mouse position
  • LMB moves platforms
  • Holding R while hovering on a platform will rotate it towards the mouse
  • LMB + RMB on a platform and WASD change the width and height, holding shift makes it faster
  • Q + RMB on a platform deletes it
  • K restarts
  • L changes your weapon (doesn't work for now)
